column3: Traffic;Kompong Speu:------ Several people were injured after a Ford minibus collided with a trailer truck on October 16
column4: 2019 at 11:55 pm on National Road 4 km 38-39 at Sla Village
column7: Kampong Speu Province.------Driving from the west
